name: Outward Hound Fun Feeder Slo Bowl – Medium 2‑Cup Capacity, Slow Feeding, Small to Medium Dogs & Cats, Non-Slip, Turquoise, Drop Pattern
short_description: Medium slow feeder dog bowl – helps slow down eating up to 10X; this SLOWEST level feeder is best for very fast eaters and small to medium dog breeds
Holds 2 cups of dry or wet dog food – this very deep dog bowl has our most challenging puzzle feeder maze design and can fit a full meal for medium-sized dogs
Mindful mealtime – encourages slower eating and longer engagement, helping pups enjoy every bite while making mealtime more fun and interactive
Multiple sizes, maze patterns, and 3 SLOW levels to choose from – Slow, Slower, or Slowest – to slow your dog down as much as needed; pick the perfect size and design for your unique pet
Non-slip, food-safe, and easy to clean – our puzzle feeders are top-rack dishwasher-safe and made without BPAs, PVCs, lead, or phthalates
product_description: Why do dogs feel like eating is a race? We're not sure, but we solved the problem anyway. With meal-lengthening ridges, deep grooves, and challenging mazes, Outward Hound Fun Feeder Slo Bowls keep dogs engaged for up to 10x longer at chow time. By creating a fun, healthy eating pace, our slow feeders help reduce obesity and bloat and improve your dog's digestion for happier, healthier pups. Available in multiple colors, sizes, and slow levels – Slow, Slower, Slowest – including a slow bowl for flat-faced breeds, there's an option for your unique dog and their eating speed. Our slow feeders are non-slip to prevent sliding and spillage, top rack dishwasher safe, BPA, PVC, lead, and phthalate free, and available in small (3/4 cups), medium (2 cups), and large (4 cups) to hold an entire meal no matter your dog's size. Go beyond the boring ol' dog bowl, and make mealtime more fun!

short_description: DESIGNED TO SLOW DOWN EATING: the unique maze design inside the bowl effectively works to slow down the rate at which pets consumes their food, without discouraging them from eating; slower eating can help prevent bloating, discomfort, and improve your pet’s overall digestion

ENGAGING DESIGN: custom design requires pets to navigate the built in features and obstacles to help keep your pet engaged in mealtime; pro tip, freeze treats in the bowl to create a fun puzzle for your pet to solve

RUBBER BOTTOM: the slow feeder bowl’s nonslip, scratch resistant, rubber bottom curves around the entire base of the bowl, helping to keep it in place on your floors; eager eaters may slightly move bowl while eating, pair with the Gorilla Grip Pet Feeding Mat

ALL FOOD TYPES: no matter what food your pet’s diet consists of, the bowl will work to help slow down their eating; the bowl can be used with wet food, dry food, fresh food, and even water or ice; no matter what type of food you use, the bowl is dishwasher safe for an easy clean; bowl is made from safe food grade materials

A BOWL FOR ANY BREED: feed your pet the perfect portion every time; the slow feeder bowl comes in 4 convenient sizes; 1 cup, 2 cups, and 4 cups, so you can find the best capacity bowl for your pet; 1 cup capacity bowl measures 7in x 7in x 1.8in; consult with a vet or pet food producer to determine the ideal amount of food for your pet

name: 2 Pack Slow Feeder Dog Bowls for Healthy Eating, Non-Slip and Anti-Choking Design, Reduces Bloating & Overeating for Medium Dogs and Cats, Easy to Clean
short_description: PREMIUM DESIGN: The slow feeder dog bowl is meticulously designed to promote healthy eating habits in pets, particularly dogs prone to rapid eating. Its intricate maze-like pattern inside the bowl creates multiple obstacles for the food, compelling the pet to eat at a slower, more deliberate pace. The bowl can slow down your dog's eating time by 10X. This design not only helps in reducing the risk of choking and bloating but also aids in digestion by encouraging smaller bites.

REDUCE ANXIETY AND INCREASE INTEREST IN EATING: This slow feeder dog bowls small breed features an innovative spiral design that effectively spaces out the food, significantly prolonging the eating process. The raised ridges serve as physical barriers that challenge the pet to maneuver around them to access their food, which stimulates mental engagement and physical activity. This activity enriches the mealtime experience, turning it into a stimulating puzzle.

NON-SLIP AND SAFE FOR EATING: The version of our slow feeding dog bowl small breed is enhanced with a strong foundation to prevent skidding, ensuring that the bowl remains in place on smooth surfaces, providing a frustration-free dining experience for your pet. Its depth and the height of the partitions are carefully calibrated to accommodate small dogs, making it versatile for various breeds. The partitions are smoothly finished to prevent any harm to your pet's mouth and nose as they eat.

DEVELOPING GOOD EATING HABITS: Our slow feeder bowl stands out due to its eco-friendly composition, being made entirely from pp materials that contribute positively to environmental sustainability. The design incorporates a ridge-like pattern that mimics natural obstacles, making every mealtime a brain-engaging hunt. The texture of the bowl is designed to massage the gums while eating, which helps in maintaining oral health. Suitable for both dry and wet food.

PERFECT CHOICE FOR PUPPYS AND SMALL AND MEDIUM BREEDS: The model of our slow feeder bowl integrates advanced technology. The bowl includes a stable base, and the slow feeder dog bowls owns the feeding maze, suitable for adapting to different ages or feeding needs. This feature makes it an excellent choice for pets in training or rehabilitation, helping them gradually improve their eating habits. It's available to cater to small and medium sizes.

name: Elevated Slow Feeder Dog Bowl - Ceramic Food Dish with Bamboo Stand - Raised Maze Design - Ideal for Medium to Large Dogs - White - 8.8 inch
short_description: Good Eating Habits Start Right Now - This dog slow feeder bowl is designed with multiple ridged obstacles that can effectively increases the difficulty of eating, change your dog's overeating behavior and improve digestion. All while making every meal more challenging and fun.

Prolong The Mealtime to 5 X - Help to reduce the chances of dog gulping, choking, vomiting, bloating and getting obesity. The slow eating dog bowl encourages paced eating while satisfies dog’s natural foraging instinct, healthier for dogs.

Selected High Quality Material - Each slow dog feeder bowl is made of premium food grade ceramics, lead free and cadmium free, non-toxic and harmless, strong and anti-bite. And the dog bowl stand is made of natural bamboo, safe and eco-friendly, sturdy and stable.

Elevated & Non-Slip Base - The slow feeding dog bowl with stand allows dogs to eat and drink in comfortable height, reduce stress on their neck and joints. Each leg of the bowl stand is equipped with anti-slip stickers to prevent the bowl from sliding around or being knocked over.

Versatile & Easy to Clean - Easily meet dog’s daily diet needs, no matter for dry food, wet food, raw food, snack or water. And the ceramic slow feeder dog bowls are dishwasher safe and microwave safe. Regarding the maintenance of the bamboo stand, just wipe it with a dry rag.

name: SunGrow Dog Slow Feed Bowl, Spiral Design Encourages Slow Eating, Interactive, 8”, Non-Slip Base, Portion Control, Blue, 1pc
short_description: Enrich Your Dog’s Mealtime --- Your pet will be introduced to the concept of slowing down their mealtime. The maze feeder bowl engages your pet longer while eating the meal. The ‘puzzle design’ tends to mentally encourage your pet and improve digestion by the virtue of making your pets work for the food. The feeder also helps with portion control

Experience No More Gastric Issues in Pets --- The slow feeder bowl for dogs by SunGrow is a uniquely designed feeding bowl that has a maze that slows them down as they eat. Speed eating might lead to vomiting, indigestion, and food bloat.

Non-Slip Base Keeps the Bowl in Place --- Dogs tend to be very enthusiastic eaters and may spread their food around the floor. Having considered this, SunGrow designed this eat bowl with non-skid base to keep the feeder bowl in place and doesn’t end up in food spillage.

Made From Durable Materials --- This feeding bowl for your pets is made from ABS (Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene), a strong and durable plastic material that can withstand high temperatures. So, worry no more before pouring a hot meal for your fur baby. It is easy to maintain and top-rack dishwasher-friendly.

Available In a Size Fit for All --- We can guarantee that both you and your pets will love the bright color of this slow dog feeding bowl. The bottom diameter measures 8” (20.7 cm) whereas top diameter measures 7.5”( 19cm ) and the product is 2”( 4.5cm ) high. This works well with either small pets like ferrets, cats or big dogs, except dogs with a big snout.

name: Slow Feeder Dog Bowl - 2 Cups Stainless Steel Dog Slow Feeder Food Bowl, Metal Non-Slip Lick Plate,Puppy or Cat Food Holder,Pet Supplies,Puzzle Maze Dish for Medium Sized Breeds
short_description: Premium Stainless Steel - Made from sturdy, food-grade stainless steel, these slow feeder dog bowls offer a safe and long-lasting alternative to traditional plastic bowls. Unlike plastic, the metal dog slow feeder bowl won’t crack, retain odors, or trap food residue. The smooth, rust-resistant surface of the stainless steel dog bowl slow feeder is easy to clean—making it a perfect choice whether you’re serving dry kibble, wet food, or raw meals.

Help Mealtime Slow - Designed with a raised bone-shaped ridge at the base, this slow feeder cat bowl naturally paces your pet’s eating habits. These slow eating dog bowls help prevent gulping, choking, and bloating by encouraging your dog or cat to work for their food. Especially suitable for pets that rush through meals, these dog dishes to slow down eating promote healthier digestion and reduces the risk of stomach discomfort.

Perfect Size - Measuring 8.6” in diameter and 1.6” deep, this dog food bowl holds 2 cups of food—the ideal amount for medium pets. These dog bowls for medium sized dog offers enough depth for efficient slow feeding without risking food overflow. The well-sized design of ensures proper portions, helping your pet maintain healthy eating habits.

No Slips or Tips - Built with a wide base and low center of gravity, this puppy bowl is designed to stay put—even during energetic mealtimes. The rubberized bottom of the dog puzzle feeder grips floors to reduce sliding and tipping, so your pet can focus on eating without chasing their stainless steel dog bowls around the room.

Feed & Treat - Get two functions in one! Use the ridged side of the dog food puzzle to serve your dog’s main meal slowly, then flip it over for a fun licking surface—ideal for snacks, yogurt, or calming peanut butter treats. This reversible design of the dog plates for food keeps feeding time varied and enriching while saving space in your kitchen, making it an essential piece of pet supplies for dogs, cats, and puppies.

short_description: 🐶【4 Adjustable Heights】Tivray raised slow feeder dog bowl can be adjusted to 4 different heights, 3.15 inches, 8.17 inches, 9.64 inches, 11.02 inches, suitable for dogs at all growing stages. This elevated dog feeder provides a healthy feeding posture and helps reduce stress on your dog's joints and bones thus relieving stress on their spine and back.

🐶【5x Slower Eating Design】The slow eating dog bowl features whale-patterned ridges. It can slow down 5x eating speed and effectively prolong the eating time of your beloved pets. Better to prevent choking, gluttony, and indigestion, reduce the burden of the stomach and help dogs establish scientific and healthy eating habits.

🐶【2.2L Large Capacity Dog Bowl】Made of premium ABS material, designed for large and extra large dogs. Our slow feeder bowl holds 9.3 cups / 2.2L dry food, perfect for multi-pet families. Easily meet your pet's daily dietary needs and is ideal for dry food, wet food, and meat paste. It is easy to wash without residual stains.

🐶【Anti-slip Design】The raised slow feeding bowl is equipped with anti-skid rubber pads at the end of legs, which not only keep your floor from scratching but also prevent moving and sliding when your dog is eating. Provide a comfortable eating space for your pet and reduce your clean-up time. Note: Place the pet bowl against the wall to prevent pets from kicking it over.

🐶【Easy to Use and Install】This elevated dog bowl for large dogs is super easy to assemble without any tools: ①Unfold the legs outwards ②Make sure the legs press down to the end ③Press the buttons and pull the foot upwards to the right height ④Place the top side up and the installation is complete.

short_description: 2-in-1 Removable Bowl: This 2-in-1 dog bowl becomes a slow feeder with the puzzle insert tray or a standard single bowl without it with wet and dry foods. The bowl is detachable, allowing for easy hand washing or cleaning in the dishwasher

Healthy Slow Eating: The slow feeder features a unique maze ridgeline pattern. This design extends the meal duration by 10 times, effectively reducing the risks of bloating. It adds an element of interactive fun to your pet's healthy eating habits

Elevated Design: The raised dog bowl has 4 removable elevated bases for small and medium dogs. It helps your pet maintain a comfortable feeding posture that helps reduce neck and cervical spine strain

Premium Material: This feeder bowl is made from ABS material. Its smooth surface protects your dog's mouth, nose, and tongue from scratches. Clean it regularly after each use to provide a clean feeding environment for your pet
Large Capacity: This bowl can hold 2 to 6 cups of dog food for small and medium breeds. Please note that the actual capacity may vary depending on the density of the food

Usage Tip: The puzzle insert tray features a secure buckle and snug-fit design to prevent pets from removing it. Just apply gentle outward pressure with hands to opposing bowl edges to leave a large gap between the insert and bowl to pop out smoothly
